amendment.description: Substitute amendment to the Roemer amendment (A010) sought to require Energy Department laboratories to reduce the number of employees by 15 percent over a period of five years and establish a Laboratory Operations Board to provide advice regarding the strategic direction for Department laboratories, the coordination of budget and policy issues affecting laboratory operations, and effective laboratory management.
amendment.purpose: A substitute amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record to reduce the number of Energy Department laboratories by 15 percent over a five-year period; and establishes a Laboratory Operations Board to provide strategic direction for Department laboratories, the coordination of budget and policy issues affecting laboratory operations, and effective laboratory management.

action.text: Substitute (A011) offered by Mr. Richardson to the Roemer amendment (A010).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 274 (Roll no. 703).
